recipe.title: Cucumber and Tomato Salad with Buttermilk Dressing
ingredients: 6 medium cucumbers, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 heads iceberg lettuce, cored and cut into 2-inch chunks
instructions: Whisk together mayonnaise, buttermilk, vinegar, and salt and pepper to taste until smooth, then whisk in chives.
Put cucumbers, tomatoes, and lettuce into bowls and serve with dressing.
